"A Newbie's Automata Survey":
"Oh, there you are, <%me>.
Hey, don't look so surprised! I mean, I called you by
your real name, didn't I? Frankly, I still have an
uncontrollable urge to call you Newbie. Hm, maybe
I WILL stop calling you by your real name.
Tell you what. If you want me to keep using your
real name, complete this simple little request,
okay, <%me>?
*Complete the mission within 20 minutes
with S Rank on Hard difficulty or above."
"へっぽこぴーの機甲種性能調査"

"<%me>見っけ！
ちょっとちょっと、せっかく名前で
呼んであげてるのに、驚かないでよ！
アンタ本当は私に、へっぽこぴーって
呼ばれたくて仕方ないんじゃないの？
やっぱり名前で呼ぶのやめようかな？
ちゃんと名前で呼んでほしいなら、
このくらい、簡単にやって見せて！
ね、<%me>！
※ハード以上、２０分以内、Ｓランククリア"
